text: Has anyone though about letting tickets being associated to other tickets? That would allow for custom-ish objects and relational tables like in Salesforce. We have several pipelines of ticket "Types" that simulate this now, but always have to alternate associations between deals. This blog provides some context <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/custom-objects-solutions-for-partners>
Idea: Prevent other websites from hotlinking images from your website
